events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week because it does not fit and I want to return it as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to return of an item that does not fit.
Assigning the refund case to agent Sarah M., who handles return requests and refund processing.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to return the jacket for a refund. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been worn or washed?
Sure, the order number is 987654321, and the jacket has not been worn or washed yet. I just tried it on once.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the return process for your jacket. You will receive a prepaid shipping label shortly to send it back.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to receiving my refund.
The refund case has been marked as resolved since the return shipment label was sent and instructions given.
Just checking in to see if you have received the return label and if you require any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and shipped the jacket back yesterday. Thank you for the great support!
The refund was processed successfully and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email; your feedback helps us improve our service.
